# selectedMenuItemTextColor

**Type Property**

The color to use for the text in menu items.

## Declaration

```swift
class var selectedMenuItemTextColor: NSColor { get }
```

## Return Value

The system color used for text in selected menu items. For general information about system colors, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/DrawColor/Tasks/SystemColors.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20000790].
